Method Detail

acceptToStore

boolean acceptToStore(java.lang.reflect.Member property,
                      java.lang.Class type,
                      java.lang.Object value)
This method should return true if this adaptor shall be used to convert data to be stored in the database for given property, given data type and value. Implementation can use name patterns, declaring class, data types or combination of them all to determine if this adaptor is applicable.

Parameters:
property - Field or accessor method for the property.
type - Type of the property. It is either return type of accessor method or field type.
value - Value to be converted
Returns:
True if this adaptor shall be used for this case

acceptToRetrieve

boolean acceptToRetrieve(java.lang.reflect.Member property,
                         java.lang.Class type,
                         java.lang.Object value)
This method should return true if this adaptor shall be used to convert data stored in the database to application type for given property given data type and value. Implementation can use name patterns, declaring class, data types or combination of them all to determine if this adaptor is applicable.

Parameters:
property - Field or mutator method for the property.
type - Type of the property. It is either type of the argument to mutator method or field type.
value - Value to be converted
Returns:
True if this adaptor shall be used for this case

toStoredValue

java.lang.Object toStoredValue(java.lang.reflect.Member property,
                               java.lang.Object value)
Converts data to the value to be stored in the database. This method only called if method acceptToStore returned true.

Parameters:
property - Field or accessor method for the property.
value - Value to be converted
Returns:
converted value.

fromStoredValue

java.lang.Object fromStoredValue(java.lang.reflect.Member property,
                                 java.lang.Object value)
Converts data from the value to be stored in the database to application type. This method only called if method acceptToRetrieve returned true.

Parameters:
property - Field or mutator method for the property.
value - Value to be converted
Returns:
converted value.
